title: For TY 2024-25
description: Submit Foreign Property Accounting Adjustments Request

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. This must be an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 value. You can only adjust for a countryCode that is in your unadjusted summary calculation.

income.description: Object containing the adjustments to income values.

totalRentsReceived.description: The adjustment to total property rental income. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

premiumsOfLeaseGrant.description: The adjustment to premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

otherPropertyIncome.description: The adjustment to other income from property, such as rent charges and ground rents, income from letting others tip waste on your land, and income for the use of a caravan or houseboat at a fixed location. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

expenses.description: Object containing the adjustments to expenses values.

consolidatedExpenses.description: The adjustment to the sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

premisesRunningCosts.description: The adjustment to rent, rates, insurance, ground rents etc. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

repairsAndMaintenance.description: The adjustment to property repairs and maintenance. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

financialCosts.description: The adjustment to loan interest and other financial costs. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

professionalFees.description: The adjustment to legal, management and other professional fees. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

costOfServices.description: The adjustment to cost of services provided, including wages. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

residentialFinancialCost.description: The adjustment to the residential financial cost that can be deductible from rental income (tax relief). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

other.description: The adjustment to other allowable property expenses. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).

travelCosts.description: The adjustment to car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places (excluding 0 or 0.00).
